rows.label: tev020801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev020801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sarona about maps.

rows.label: tev020801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev020801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sarona if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sarona about the Prospectors division.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Sarona for her thoughts on the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Sarona for her opinion of the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Sarona about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1031
rows.name:
Ask Sarona for her thoughts on
the Ganglion's weaponry.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Sarona about conditions during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Sarona for her thoughts on the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1061
rows.name: Ask Sarona about her experiences with the Wrothians.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1071
rows.name: Ask Sarona about the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev020801_SEL1081
rows.name: Ask Sarona what she intends to do next.

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Huh. You're that new crew member they found,
aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0002
rows.name:
So what do you think? Isn't this town huge?
But as big as it seems, Mira is a whole lot bigger—
so don't go running off half-cocked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0003
rows.name:
That comm device you're holding can display a map
of the surrounding area. If you lose your bearings,
just fire it up and take a look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0004
rows.name:
The triangle is your current position, the teal dots
are your fellow team members, and the white dots
are people like me. As for Skells...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, you don't have one of those yet, so never mind!
But when you do get one, take a look at your map
and see for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0008
rows.name:
You've heard of Talon Rock, right? That big rocky
mountain in the northern part of Primordia? It's that
big spire you can even see from the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0009
rows.name:
That area hasn't been fully explored yet, so Eleonora
is always nagging us to get out there and do a survey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0010
rows.name:
But the Talon Rock mountain is swarming with
dangerous indigens, which makes it a big hassle.
We've been kicking that can down the road forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0011
rows.name:
But now they aren't even offering us any other missions,
so we basically have no choice BUT to do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0012
rows.name:
That Eleonora has the face of an angel, but she's
doing the devil's work in that receptionist's guise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0020
rows.name:
As a member of the Prospectors division, my primary
duty is finding and collecting the minerals and other
resources of Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0021
rows.name:
To do that, we explore each region, plant data probes,
and perform other related tasks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0022
rows.name:
I volunteered to join the division because I thought it
sounded easy—I didn't want to have to be fighting
dangerous indigens, like the Harriers and Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0023
rows.name:
But it's a heck of a lot tougher than I'd thought!
Scientific research can't advance without resources,
so we have BLADE HQ on our backs constantly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Although I suppose if we're gonna live on this planet
forever, then someone's gotta do this sort of thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0046
rows.name:
Those little xenos are wandering around the
administrative district as we speak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0047
rows.name:
Is that really okay? My friend was saying they might
secretly be trying to conquer New LA from that big ol'
ship of theirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0048
rows.name: What if that friendship treaty is all a ruse?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0049
rows.name:
As soon as we let down our guard,
death could rain down from above![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG0050
rows.name:
And then the survivors would be subjects for creepy
alien experiments and probing! So very much probing...
Anyway, we can't let that happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1001
rows.name:
I was thinking like, maybe if we could talk to them,
we could come to understand each other better.
Just like the way Inisae and I have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1002
rows.name:
So when I ran into a Ganglion soldier on a mission,
I figured I'd walk right up and try to start a dialogue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1003
rows.name:
But he was just like, "All humans must die!" 
Then he started shooting at me. A lot, actually.
Anyway, I ran the hell out of there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1004
rows.name:
So I don't think we're gonna be friends anytime soon.
I guess something about us really just bugs the crap
out of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1005
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm satisfied now that no matter how long
we have to deal with them, we'll never come to any
sort of understanding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1010
rows.name:
Hey, thanks for everything you did for us back
on that mountain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1011
rows.name:
Now Inisae and I have become good friends,
and it's all because of you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1012
rows.name:
A little while ago, the two of us went out to have 
coffee with Eleonora at a café in the commercial
district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1013
rows.name:
And imagine my surprise when Inisae brought out
another one of those cinicula intestines that look like
chocolates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1014
rows.name:
Anyway, Eleonora was all, "Wow, I can't believe their
viscera can be cooked like this!" Then she just dug in
and gobbled it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1015
rows.name:
There's a whole lot of scary lurking behind that cheery
smile of hers, man...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1020
rows.name:
I was just remembering that Skell thing the creepy
squid lady Goetia was riding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1021
rows.name: Oh, and that idol of theirs we found in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1022
rows.name:
Anyway, it made me wonder—why does everything the
Ganglion use have to be so creepy and disgusting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1023
rows.name:
And now Meredith & Co. is selling gear that's inspired
by all that nasty junk, and folks are lining up to buy it!
It's disgusting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1024
rows.name:
I don't care how good it is on paper, there's no
way in hell I'm touching any of that awful stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1030
rows.name:
I heard that the city's defenders slew countless
enemies and managed to hold the east gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1031
rows.name:
And I also heard there was one super-strong BLADE
who even managed to take out the enemy commander!
So I asked what [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] name was...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1032
rows.name:
And they said it was [ST:playername ]!
So I was like, holy crap! Because that's YOU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1033
rows.name:
I mean, wow. I knew you were good and all,
but I had no idea that you were THAT good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1034
rows.name:
You gotta keep that roll of yours going. Go bring
down the Ganglion and find our Lifehold Core![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1040
rows.name:
The Wrothians told us that the Ganglion headquarters
is in Cauldros, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1041
rows.name:
So does that mean that those guys are cool with us
now? Because if they said it with the intention of
leaving the Ganglion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1042
rows.name:
Well, then maybe we could be friends with them,
the way Inisae and I are good friends now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1043
rows.name:
Personally, I LOVE cats, so I think I could really
get along great with xenoforms like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1048
rows.name:
After the Wrothians left the Ganglion and joined us,
I was pretty excited about making friends with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1049
rows.name:
But everything I do to befriend them just makes them
angry at me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1050
rows.name:
I've dangled Kiran catnip in front of their noses...
I've hit them in the face with big balls of yarn...
Nothing seems to work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1051
rows.name:
I don't understand it. I've raised cats all my life!
I was so sure that making friends with a catlike
species would be easy for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1052
rows.name:
I guess I'll just need to break out the big guns.
Next time maybe I'll sneak up and rub their chins
when they aren't looking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1057
rows.name:
If you and the Pathfinders hadn't traveled to the far
reaches of Mira to install all those data probes,
we would have been in big trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1058
rows.name:
And we sure never would have figured out that the
Lifehold Core had fallen into the sea near Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1059
rows.name:
I know recovering it won't be easy, but we found it,
so that means everyone's gonna be okay. ...Er, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1060
rows.name:
Let's use every resource we've found here on Mira
and go get our real bodies back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1065
rows.name:
Now that the Ganglion have mostly been destroyed,
Inisae and I were thinking about hiking across Mira
together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1066
rows.name:
Just two girls going wherever the spirit takes them!
Doesn't that sound like fun?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1067
rows.name:
We can go visit the ruins of Oblivia,
or see the fantastic scenery of Sylvalum...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1068
rows.name:
Imagine actually walking around in the picturesque
areas we've seen on the research probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020801_MSG1069
rows.name:
Hey, you know a lot about Mira, right?
If you think of any great spots for us to visit,
you gotta clue me in![ST:wait ]
